thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: A Bomber Carves Violent Path Across Austin

author: WSJ Staff
title: A Bomber Carves Violent Path Across Austin
text:
Police are investigating a string of bombings across Austin since early March that have left two people dead and several others injured.
Initially, the locations of the blasts and the race of the victims led officials to speculate that the crimes were targeting a specific area or could be racially motivated, but the more recent attacks dispel those theories.
The...
